description: From nigger +â€Ž head, reflecting a supposed resemblance to a black person's head.

entries.meaning: (nautical, dated, now offensive) A bollard made from an old cannon.
(geology, archaic, colloquial, now offensive) A geode.
(now offensive) A coral or stone outcrop that stands above the surface of the water.
examples: Landward is the almost unbroken wall of submerged reefs where the big niggerhead corals send their solid bulks up to within a fathom or two of the surface.

entries.meaning: (US, Alaska, dated, now offensive) A tussock (clump of plant material), found on tundra.
examples: These plants fill the interstices between the grasses and tiny shrubs that make the outer, fuller form of the niggerhead.

entries.meaning: (archaic, countable, uncountable) A strong black variety of chewing tobacco, usually in twisted plug form.
